attributes.title: I DIED BECAUSE OF THIS APP!!!!!😡🤬
attributes.review:
he’s an orange cheeto racist pig😻😹
i was not happy when i opened the app. i thought this was an app to get in contact with the babysitter who was supposed to take care of my gremlin.😫🦶🏻 instead, i opened it and i was overwhelmed. i went into cardiac arrest and never saw the light of day again😹 fly high angle (me😝🙈✨) you will be forgotten😼😁 (yeah❤️)

When I downloaded this app, so many horrific, traumatic events occured😾😾 My best friend was run over by a flying caterpillar and was thrown back into the ground😿😿😿 After that the ⒷⒾⒼ ⒷⒶⒹ ⒸⒽⒺⒺⓉⓄ ⒷⓊⓃⓀⒺⓇ ⒷⓄⓎ sent his N̆̈Ĭ̈N̆̈J̆̈Ă̈S̆̈  and they 𝓼𝓪𝓬𝓻𝓪𝓯𝓲𝓬𝓮𝓭 my pet chair👺👺 I am very traumatized😭My pet cat was also ᔕᗩᑕᖇᗩᖴIᑕᗴᗪ for Bunker Boy to get more votes😿 𝔻𝕆 ℕ𝕆𝕋 𝔻𝕆𝕎𝕃𝕆𝔸𝔻 𝕋ℍ𝕀𝕊 𝔸ℙℙ🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬 Anyway Trump 2020✨💅🏻🌼 6 FT Under🌱✨💛🧚🏻

attributes.title: HORRIBLE 🤢
attributes.review: where do i begin?!? this app is horrible and i keep seeing an orange on my screen 🍊👄🍊 it displays horrible content that is very inappropriate, racist, and anti lgbtq+ it also has a very horrible software and needs to be taken off the app store and re done COMPLETELY. maybe add a new face on it as well *cough* bernie *cough*

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app took weeks to download and it keep downloading with a lot of technical problems I don’t recommend no one getting this app literally the worst app in the market it wouldn’t even let me write the things I needed to write disgusting don’t recommend to anyone.

attributes.title: Total waste
attributes.review: This app was awful not only did it take days to download but it was making fun of my dog, he then proceeded to Hagar a seizure and is now at the vet I expect trump to pay for his mistakes but clearly he wont because he’s just a lil bunker boy. And now he has the nerve to delete tiktok? Unacceptable I don’t want a dictator as my president

attributes.title: My experience
attributes.review: I opened the app and dragon flames came out at me. This is not what had expected. You are a billionaire and that was such a traumatizing moment you put me through. My friend also tried to download this app and ended up getting herpes. Do not download this app if you want to live!

attributes.title: Waste of time
attributes.review: This app took a whole week to download and whenever I opened the app it would glitch a little bit then it would just crash. This app gives you no information on him I don’t recommend this app it’s a waste of time.

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: Well today I decided to download this app you support our great president✨But as soon I downloaded my phone started glitching and then my phone turned off and now I’m reviewing off my moms friends grandsons sister mothers dads cousins dogs kitty’s girlfriends aunties teachers boss’s friends cousins wife’s phone😭😭😭 Why Donald Duck- Donald Trump whyyyy✨✨✨

attributes.title: Un un
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app I was scared for life I saw trumps little orange booty and I was crying and last night I had a nightmare and it was terrifying for me 😭😭

attributes.title: Donald
attributes.review: He has shown dictatorship.  He has done nothing for America.   The economy was built under Obama. He will never progress. God says love thy neighbor he is so jealous of Obama that it’s a sin.  He is a disgrace as a human being especially as a president. He has no value no morals and is incompetent.  He swears he is God gift he is disgusting it’s a shame that he was made president
